BoxIntent: Project a Box onto its intrinsic semantic-form subspace.

Domain.Input: Box B with (δ, Φ, Π, μ, …) internal states

Constraints.Purity: Φ\_s discards δ-gradients and causal Π-structure

CrossLinks.δ: Removes δ-content; Φ\_s ∘ δ \= 0 on semantic subspace
CrossLinks.Π: Semantic form restricts Π-domain; Π only evaluates Φ\_s(B)
CrossLinks.Θ: Semantic polarity attaches to Φ\_s outputs
